birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳专区
birth_place.en: Mianyang Prefecture, Sichuan, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国企业家，大连万达集团股份有限公司的创始人兼董事长，中国大陆前首富。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, founder and chairman of Dalian Wanda Group, and former richest man in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军成员，曾参加长征，是王健林的父亲。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army who participated in the Long March, and is the father of Wang Jianlin.

description.zh-cn: 林氏投资集团董事长，王健林的妻子。
description.en: Chairwoman of Lin's Investment Group and wife of Wang Jianlin.

description.zh-cn: 中国商人和社交媒体名人，王健林之子。
description.en: Chinese businessman and social media personality, son of Wang Jianlin.

nodes.id: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

zh-cn: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国的跨国企业集团，总部位于北京，业务涵盖商业地产、文化、金融等多个领域。
description.en: A Chinese multinational conglomerate based in Beijing, with business interests in commercial property, culture, and finance.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国辽宁省沈阳市的一所公立综合性大学。
description.en: A public comprehensive university located in Shenyang, Liaoning, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省已撤销的专区。
description.en: A former administrative division in Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军大连陆军学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大连陆军学院

description.zh-cn: 曾位于中国辽宁省大连市的一所军事院校。
description.en: A former military academy located in Dalian, Liaoning, China.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪80年代，中华人民共和国政府对其武装力量——中国人民解放军进行的精简整编工作，裁减员额100万。
description.en: A reduction of military personnel by one million in the People's Liberation Army of the People's Republic of China during the 1980s.

nodes.id: 大连市西岗区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省大连市西岗区的政府机关。
description.en: The governmental body of Xigang District, Dalian, Liaoning Province, China.

zh-cn: 大连万达房地产集团公司

description.zh-cn: 大连万达集团股份有限公司的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of Dalian Wanda Group Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国的连锁电影院，曾为全球最大的连锁影院。
description.en: An American movie theater chain, formerly the largest in the world.

description.zh-cn: 大连万达集团旗下的文化产业公司。
description.en: The cultural industry subsidiary of Dalian Wanda Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家房地产开发公司。
description.en: A real estate developer in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家房地产开发公司。
description.en: A real estate developer in China.

description.zh-cn: 由严重急性呼吸系统综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）导致的全球大流行。
description.en: A global pandemic caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

nodes.id: 甘肃省兰州市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 甘肃省兰州市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 位于中国甘肃省兰州市的司法机构。
description.en: A judicial body located in Lanzhou, Gansu Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 由王健林成立的足球俱乐部，后被实德集团收购。
description.en: A football club founded by Wang Jianlin, later acquired by Shide Group.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的足球运动管理机构。
description.en: The governing body for football in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由林宁担任董事长的公司，业务涉及建筑、餐饮、贸易等多个领域。
description.en: A company chaired by Lin Ning, with business interests in construction, catering, and trade.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国女商人，习近平的姐姐。
description.en: Chinese businesswoman, sister of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国商人，齐桥桥的丈夫，习近平的姐夫。
description.en: Chinese businessman, husband of Qi Qiaoqiao, and brother-in-law of Xi Jinping.

nodes.id: 北京秦川大地投资有限公司

zh-cn: 北京秦川大地投资有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由齐桥桥和邓家贵控股的投资公司。
description.en: An investment company controlled by Qi Qiaoqiao and Deng Jiagui.

nodes.id: 万达商业地产股份有限公司

zh-cn: 万达商业地产股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 大连万达集团旗下的商业地产公司。
description.en: The commercial property subsidiary of Dalian Wanda Group.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年期间领导的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Communist Party of China from 1927 to 1937.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一次大规模军事转移。
description.en: A massive military retreat undertaken by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 王义全是王健林的父亲。
description.en: Wang Yiquan is the father of Wang Jianlin.

description.zh-cn: 林宁是王健林的妻子。
description.en: Lin Ning is the wife of Wang Jianlin.

description.zh-cn: 王健林是王思聪的父亲。
description.en: Wang Jianlin is the father of Wang Sicong.

description.zh-cn: 王健林出生于四川省绵阳专区第二人民医院。
description.en: Wang Jianlin was born in the Second People's Hospital of Mianyang Prefecture, Sichuan Province.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军大连陆军学院

description.zh-cn: 1978年进入大连陆军学院学习，1979年8月毕业。
description.en: He entered the Dalian Army Academy for studies in 1978 and graduated in August 1979.

description.zh-cn: 1983年就读辽宁大学党政专修班，1986年毕业获得经济管理专业的学位。
description.en: He attended the Party and Government Cadre training class at Liaoning University from 1983, graduating in 1986 with a degree in Economic Management.

description.zh-cn: 王健林是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wang Jianlin is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 王健林是大连万达集团股份有限公司的董事长。
description.en: Wang Jianlin is the Chairman of Dalian Wanda Group.

relationships.target: 大连市西岗区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 1986年，王健林转业任大连市西岗区人民政府办公室主任。
description.en: In 1986, Wang Jianlin was transferred to become the Office Director of the Xigang District People's Government in Dalian.

relationships.target: 大连万达房地产集团公司

description.zh-cn: 1992年8月，王健林成立了大连万达房地产集团公司。
description.en: In August 1992, Wang Jianlin founded Dalian Wanda Real Estate Group Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 王健林接手大连足球队后，成立了大连万达足球俱乐部。
description.en: After taking over the Dalian football team, Wang Jianlin founded the Dalian Wanda Football Club.

relationships.source: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2012年，万达集团以26亿美元并购了全球第二大影院公司AMC。
description.en: In 2012, Wanda Group acquired AMC, the world's second-largest cinema chain, for $2.6 billion.

relationships.source: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2012年底，万达集团成立万达文化产业集团。
description.en: At the end of 2012, Wanda Group established the Wanda Cultural Industry Group.

relationships.source: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 万达集团将13个万达文化旅游项目以438.44亿人民币出售给融创中国。
description.en: Wanda Group sold 13 Wanda Cultural Tourism projects to Sunac China for 43.844 billion RMB.

relationships.source: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 万达集团将旗下77家酒店项目以199.06亿人民币出售给富力地产。
description.en: Wanda Group sold 77 of its hotel projects to R&F Properties for 19.906 billion RMB.

relationships.source: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 万达集团与中国足协达成战略合作，承诺三年内至少出资5亿元人民币，全面支援中国足球振兴。
description.en: Wanda Group reached a strategic partnership with the Chinese Football Association, promising to invest at least 500 million RMB over three years to fully support the revitalization of Chinese football.

description.zh-cn: 在百万大裁军的背景下，王健林从军队转业，进入地方政府工作，为其后来的商业生涯奠定了基础。
description.en: Against the backdrop of the one-million-man military reduction, Wang Jianlin transitioned from the army to local government, laying the foundation for his later business career.

description.zh-cn: 由于冠状病毒大流行，王健林的房地产和影视事业都急剧下降，导致其财富缩水并跌出富豪榜前列。
description.en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, Wang Jianlin's real estate and film businesses declined sharply, causing his wealth to shrink and drop him from the top ranks of the rich list.

relationships.source: 甘肃省兰州市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 对王健林实施了限制消费令。
description.en: Imposed a consumption restriction order on Wang Jianlin.

description.zh-cn: 林宁是林氏投资集团的董事长。
description.en: Lin Ning is the chairwoman of Lin's Investment Group.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是习近平的姐姐。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is the elder sister of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 邓家贵是齐桥桥的丈夫。
description.en: Deng Jiagui is the husband of Qi Qiaoqiao.

relationships.source: 北京秦川大地投资有限公司
relationships.target: 万达商业地产股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由齐桥桥和邓家贵控股的北京秦川大地投资有限公司于2009年8月入股万达商业地产，并在其2014年12月上市前将全部股票转让。
description.en: Beijing Qinchuan Dadi Investment Co., Ltd., controlled by Qi Qiaoqiao and Deng Jiagui, invested in Wanda Commercial Properties in August 2009 and sold all its shares before the company's IPO in December 2014.

relationships.source: 万达商业地产股份有限公司
relationships.target: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 万达商业地产股份有限公司是万达集团旗下的公司。
description.en: Wanda Commercial Properties is a subsidiary of Dalian Wanda Group.

description.zh-cn: 王义全是参加过长征的中国工农红军成员。
description.en: Wang Yiquan was a member of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army who participated in the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军进行了长征军事转移。
description.en: The Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army undertook the Long March military retreat.
